com.sun.xml.xsom
Interface XSFacet

All Superinterfaces:
XSComponent
public interface XSFacet
extends XSComponent

Facet for a simple type.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi (kohsuke.kawaguchi@sun.com)
